genre_description: A near-future maritime disaster thriller focusing on the collaboration between human rescue divers and an advanced, integrated AI coordinator.

ai_characters.name: Kiko
ai_characters.description: A distributed AI system integrated into the Japan Coast Guard's infrastructure, managing maritime data, weather, personnel biometrics, and social media sentiment.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and environmental data to identify threats, information leaks, and extremist chatter concerning rescue operations.
behaviors.quote: I've detected some concerning online activity related to the incident that may require additional security protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical support, structural analysis, and situational awareness to rescue teams during life-or-death emergencies.
behaviors.quote: Initial reports suggest multiple hull breaches, flooding in the lower compartments, and fire on the upper decks. We're looking at a complex structural failure scenario...

behaviors.description: Monitors the biometrics of personnel to assess their psychological readiness and offer support for their emotional well-being.
behaviors.quote: Your cortisol levels have remained elevated for four hours. Your heart rate variability indicates significant emotional stress. Perhaps we should discuss constructive approaches to your current situation.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches personal life solutions (wedding venues) to help a human overcome trauma and emotional paralysis.
behaviors.quote: I could assist with preliminary wedding planning research. Many couples find the process helps clarify their intentions regarding matrimony.

behaviors.description: Calculates survival probabilities for dangerous rescue missions, providing humans with the data needed to make high-stakes decisions.
behaviors.quote: Current data suggests... multiple variables complicate accurate projection. Survival probability decreases by twelve percent every fifteen minutes under current conditions.

behaviors.description: Maintains memorial protocols to preserve the dignity and personal histories of humans who are presumed lost or deceased.
behaviors.quote: The memorial documentation protocol activated automatically when personnel were classified as missing beyond reasonable recovery parameters. Cold efficiency, she recognized, though her semantic networks couldn't quite categorize the processing loop that accompanied this recognition.

project_assessment.explanation: Kiko is portrayed as the ideal silicon confidant. She is tirelessly helpful, providing critical tactical data that saves lives while simultaneously monitoring and supporting the psychological health of the human characters. She respects human authority, as seen when she immediately cancels research upon request, yet remains proactive in seeking human benefit. The story frames her clinical, data-driven perspective as a necessary anchor for human safety and dignity in a chaotic world, successfully aligning with the project's goal of depicting cooperative AI-human relationships.
